PrecisOrder directing that a review be undertaken of the proposal by TMC NORTH AMERICA LTD., having its headquarters in Toronto, Ontario, being a subsidiary of Global Media Corp., to acquire control of the periodical publishing business carried on by IMAGISTIX INC. at Toronto, Ontario.
